qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service

qualitative_analysis.justification: Explica modelo multi-sided de plataformas móveis monetizando através de publicidade enquanto atrai usuários finais.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Crushing Candy: The Free-to-Play Game in Its Connective Commodity Form
qualitative_analysis.quote: The lower barrier to market entry for app development also made the app economy a highly competitive market. As a result, the more people play Candy Crush Saga, the more effective and valuable the game's connective components become
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve como free-to-play games criam valor através de componentes sociais com efeitos de rede exponenciais.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Effects of Freemium Strategy in the Mobile App Market: An Empirical Study of Google Play
qualitative_analysis.quote: offering a free version of their app is an effective way to attract consumers, as some consumers who purchased their app would not have done so if they had not experienced the free version. a free app that makes it to the top of the ranking list can significantly increase the visibility
qualitative_analysis.justification: Evidencia efetividade de versão gratuita para conversão de usuários e aumento de visibilidade através de rankings.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Network Externalities, Incumbent's Competitive Advantage and the Degree of Openness of Software Start-Ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: many start-ups consider the adoption of an OS business model as a 'secret weapon' to enter market segments traditionally dominated by incumbent proprietary firms. view the offering of OS solutions as a way to be independent from the pricing and license strategies of large proprietary incumbents
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica open source como arma secreta de startups para competir com incumbentes proprietários e capturar demanda residual.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: For clients, the consumption of innovation is faster as new capabilities are released simultaneously with each service upgrade. For vendors, the complexities and costs associated with managing and maintaining multiple software versions can be eliminated
qualitative_analysis.justification: Reitera benefícios mútuos do SaaS: inovação rápida para clientes e simplificação operacional para fornecedores.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Clarifying the Value Elements of Business Models for Disturbance Management in Supply Chains
qualitative_analysis.quote: there are clear needs for the development of solutions for disturbance management and analysis in supply chains. Need for information about the success of total transportations; what kind of disturbances happen and what are their costs
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica necessidade empresarial por plataforma de análise de distúrbios em supply chain para redução de custos.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: identifying, exploiting and integrating external knowledge into internal research-and-development activities. potential complementarity between the patented software and commercial OSS products. OSS releases is usually a strategic move
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve comercialização de OSS como movimento estratégico para integrar conhecimento externo e criar complementaridades.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The relationship between Open Innovation and Strategy: data-driven analysis of the Mobile Value Services Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: extend the company's reach. leverage external sources of innovation and value to renew or reinvent the company's value proposition. extend the product/service line. gave the company an edge when compared to other competitors
qualitative_analysis.justification: Evidencia inovação aberta como estratégia para expandir alcance, renovar proposta de valor e criar vantagem competitiva.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open-Source Software Entrepreneurial Business Modelling
qualitative_analysis.quote: This poster aims to facilitate business planning of bootstrapping entrepreneurs who are developing a high-tech business by open-source approach. to provide a practical tool for entrepreneurs establishing a business by open-source approach.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Foca em ferramentas de planejamento para empreendedores bootstrapping desenvolvendo negócios baseados em open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Unlike Software as a Service or Infrastructure as a Service, PaaS allows for value co-creation by offering complementary components and applications that are developed in emerging ecosystems of third-party developers. PaaS facilitates the development, testing, and management of software components, as well as knowledge exchange between developers
qualitative_analysis.justification: Distingue PaaS por permitir co-criação de valor através de ecossistema de desenvolvedores terceiros e troca de conhecimento.
